channel.title: I'M New
channel.description:
Hello everyone, i have sticky question's about moparscape :P...
I decided to create my own Moparscape private server. Then i search download's and Tutorial's I found base servers, and I had to choose:
• 317Serv • Hyperion • RSDaemon • rs2dv
What is the best base server to start my little dirty carrer :P, please i'f you have experience about these Base servers, i will wait your answer
Cheers.... :D

item.title: I'M New
item.dc:creator: @CrueLL CrueLL
item.description:
@CrueLL wrote:

BIG THANKS TO :

Clawz fury - for answer this qustion
Jmood128 - about RS2
brandonscarinfo - some information

Using delta/PI Will Not get you a successful server unless your a really good programmer.

Yeah, i understand that… these couple month’s will be complicated for me.

My first moparscape server will be post here for test :P, because sever will be dirty, I need to learn much more then i expect…

Thanks for who try to help me.

Another little question:
this Deta where you talking about ???

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

item.title: I'M New
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:6, topic:379009”][quote author=brandonscarinfo link=topic=474864.msg3472514#msg3472514 date=1295396334]

I say DO start off with one of those four. Download them all and look through to see which makes more sense to you. Starting with PI, Delta or any of the other bloated messes will deter you from learning. You don’t have to be an advanced programmer to use those bases. Make sure you load them into an IDE is all, it will assist with syntax errors and building the source.

I never understood how to use an IDE, i downloaded eclipse but idk how to use or what it can be used for haha, maybe you could please help me with that rep++ if u do ;o
[/quote]Sure, I’m at work now. I’ll PM you when I get home.[/quote]

Thanks, Rep++'d u in advance

Read full topic

I say DO start off with one of those four. Download them all and look through to see which makes more sense to you. Starting with PI, Delta or any of the other bloated messes will deter you from learning. You don’t have to be an advanced programmer to use those bases. item.title: I'M New
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Don’t start off with any of those bases you provided above. Those bases are for extremely advanced programmers. They are basically blank (Except hyperion) and you have to write the server yourself which you do not have the knowledge to do.

I recommended starting off with a simple delta. Then after a few months when you become a better programmer move on to project insanity or still stay on delta.

Then after you become advanced use Hyperion.

Using delta/PI Will Not get you a successful server unless your a really good programmer.

Hyperion is praised because of it’s stablity

Hope I helped

Read full topic

item.title: I'M New
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

There have been 3 of these in the last week…
Just look a few pages back next time.
I recommend PI. Its good for starters…delta has a lot of tutorials though. Its all personal preference.
